🐛Workaround Coupled Views (#1207)

# Description

This is a bug in the DMS API which is already reported. This PR
implements a temporary workaround.
 
## Risk Reviewer
Note the same workaround has already been through risk-review for
Toolkit: https://github.com/cognitedata/toolkit/pull/1490

This is a 191 line PR, the rest is YAML - test data.

## Bump

- [x] Patch
- [ ] Minor
- [ ] Skip

## Changelog
### Fixed

- The `neat.to.cdf.data_model()` no longer fails for larger models
coupled views through reverse direct relations and implements.
